subject: Re: Problem running single test of a test case
msgSnippet: The Eclipse bug for this is: https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=169222 We re actually hoping that JUnit can update the JUnit 4 runner so it can also
messageBody:
The Eclipse bug for this is:
https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=169222

We're actually hoping that JUnit can update the JUnit 4 runner so it
can also run single 'legacy' tests.
Bug for this is:
http://sourceforge.net/tracker/index.php?func=detail&aid=1627783&group_id=15278&atid=365278
